Detailed Description

Class NodeOverlap represents the intersection between two node centered geometry boxes. It is a subclass of hier::BoxOverlap and records the portions of index space that needs to be copied between two objects with node centered geometry.

See also:
hier::BoxOverlap
pdat::NodeOverlap

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

SAMRAI::pdat::NodeOverlap::NodeOverlap ( const hier::BoxContainer &  boxes,
const hier::Transformation &  transformation 
)

The constructor takes the list of boxes and the tranformation from source to destination index spaces. This information is used later in the generation of communication schedules.

SAMRAI::pdat::NodeOverlap::~NodeOverlap (  )  [virtual]

The virtual destructor does nothing interesting except deallocate box data.

Member Function Documentation

bool SAMRAI::pdat::NodeOverlap::isOverlapEmpty (  )  const [virtual]

Return whether there is an empty intersection between the two node centered boxes. This method over-rides the virtual function in the hier::BoxOverlap base class.

Implements SAMRAI::hier::BoxOverlap.

const hier::BoxContainer & SAMRAI::pdat::NodeOverlap::getDestinationBoxContainer (  )  const [virtual]

Return the list of boxes (in node centered index space) that constitute the intersection. The boxes are given in the destination coordinate space and must be shifted by -(getSourceOffset()) to lie in the source index space.

Referenced by SAMRAI::pdat::OuternodeData< TYPE >::getDataStreamSize(), SAMRAI::pdat::NodeData< TYPE >::getDataStreamSize(), SAMRAI::pdat::OuternodeData< TYPE >::packStream(), SAMRAI::pdat::NodeData< TYPE >::packStream(), SAMRAI::pdat::OuternodeData< TYPE >::sum(), SAMRAI::pdat::OuternodeData< TYPE >::unpackStream(), SAMRAI::pdat::NodeData< TYPE >::unpackStream(), and SAMRAI::pdat::OuternodeData< TYPE >::unpackStreamAndSum().

void SAMRAI::pdat::NodeOverlap::getSourceBoxContainer ( hier::BoxContainer &  src_boxes  )  const [virtual]

Get a BoxContainer representing the source boxes of the overlap.

The src_boxes container will be filled with the node-centered source boxes of the overlap in the source coordinate space.

Parameters:
[out] src_boxes 
Precondition:
src_boxes.isEmpty()

References SAMRAI::hier::BoxContainer::front(), SAMRAI::hier::IntVector::getOne(), SAMRAI::hier::Transformation::inverseTransform(), SAMRAI::hier::BoxContainer::isEmpty(), and TBOX_ASSERT.

const hier::IntVector & SAMRAI::pdat::NodeOverlap::getSourceOffset (  )  const [virtual]

Return the offset between the destination and source index spaces. The destination index space is the source index spaced shifted by this amount.

Implements SAMRAI::hier::BoxOverlap.

References SAMRAI::hier::Transformation::getOffset().

const hier::Transformation & SAMRAI::pdat::NodeOverlap::getTransformation (  )  const [virtual]

Refturn the transformation between the destination and source index spaces.

The destination index space is the source index space rotated and shifted by the returned transformation.

Returns:
The transformation.

Implements SAMRAI::hier::BoxOverlap.
